document_data.caption: A map showing Flipcoin Alley and surroundings in the Field Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Flipcoin Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Flipcoin Alley''' was a back alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Flipcoin Alley was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]]. It was wedged between [[Burnt Inn Street]] and the wall of the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. Flipcoin Alley branched south from Burnt Inn Street and branched several more times within its neighborhood.
